NetworkSliceSubnet.description: Represents the properties of a network slice subnet instance in a 5G network.

administrativeState.description: The administrative state of the network slice instance. It describes the permission to use or prohibition against using the instance, imposed through the OAM services.

description.description: Human readable description of the NS instance.

ipAddress.description: This parameter specifies the IP address assigned to a logical transport interface/endpoint. It can be an IPv4 address (See RFC 791) or an IPv6 address (See RFC 2373).

logicInterfaceId.description: This parameter specifies the identify of a logical transport interface. It could be VLAN ID (See IEEE 802.1Q), MPLS Tag or Segment ID.

managedFunctionRef.description: The managed functions that the NetworkSliceSubnet is associated with.

nsInfo.description: This list represents the properties of network service information corresponding to the network slice subnet instance.

nsName.description: Human readable name of the NS instance.

operationalState.description: The operational state of the network slice instance. It describes whether or not the resource is physically installed and working.

sliceProfileList.description: List of SliceProfiles supported by the network slice subnet instance
